basics.label: Director of Information Technology
basics.summary: Seeking a position as a Director of I.T. in a company where I am able to utilize my experience and training in networking, troubleshooting, and customer relations.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Main point of contact on all IT-related matters supporting over 60 users locally and 150 users remotely. Worked with service providers and vendors, cutting IT budget over 45%. Implemented new MPLS network and Phone system. Oversees IT financials. Established an IT Governance department. Standards for gathering information for use in trend analysis and reporting information to company leaders.
highlights: Implemented new MPLS network and Phone system

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supervised and led IT infrastructure team. Worked with service providers and vendors cutting IT budget over 15%. Managed and designed IT security solutions and policies for all locations. Oversaw data center operations.
highlights: Managed and designed IT security solutions and policies
